attributes.action: Create A New BBC Radio Station For Older people.
attributes.additional_details:
BBC Radio 2 was originally set up to cater for the interests of the older person.

However this station has long left behind looking after particularly the musical, but also  other interests of older people of say over 55 years of age.

If I say 'Chris Evans' I can rest my case!

I want the government to take action and instruct the BBC to start a new radio station with instructions to focus on the musical and other interests of the older generation.
